### Analyses of Phylogenetics and Evolution
 + call: library(ape)
 
 + description: ape provides functions for reading and manipulating phylogenetic trees and DNA sequences, computing DNA distances,    estimating trees with distance-based methods, and a range of methods for comparative analyses and analysis of diversification.
 
 + use: visualization of clusters

 + note: The complete list of functions can be displayed with library(help = ape).
